All are implemented as of now. No further suggestions
1) FFM facility is not designed to handle this volume. 2) Space issue 3) Weak Inbound capacity
Responsiveness, Ownership of actions and Proactiveness have some room for improvement from a variety of our touchpoints in the business.

We have issues related to the quality of our products once they are delivered to customers. We wrote an email to our Account Manager Ms. Amjad and we are sure she will work internally to resolve these issues with the corrective actions.
